perturbation.original_text: B. ESSI's products do, and will, conform at all times to all applicable federal, state and local laws, rules, regulations, ordinances, and other enactments and industry standards, including, but not limited to, those relating to product safety.
perturbation.changed_text: B. ESSI's products will endeavor to conform to applicable federal, state and local laws, rules, regulations, ordinances, and other enactments and industry standards, including those relating to product safety to the best of their understanding.
perturbation.explanation: The original text makes a clear and unambiguous assertion that ESSI's products *will* conform to all applicable laws and standards. The modified text weakens this obligation by stating that ESSI will *endeavor* to conform and adding the subjective qualifier 'to the best of their understanding.' This introduces ambiguity regarding the level of effort and knowledge required for compliance, potentially leading to non-compliance.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (FD&C Act) and Consumer Product Safety Act (CPSA)

perturbation.original_text: ESSI hereby agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Talent, his agents, representatives and employees (referred to collectively as "Talent Indemnities") from and against any and all claims, actions, causes of action, damages, injuries, expenses, liabilities (joint and several), penalties fines, attorney fees, court costs, and any other expenses incurred by Talent Indemnities arising out of (1) breach by ESSI of any of the terms, representations or warranties made by ESSI in this Agreement; or (2) ESSI product liability or trademark patent or other proprietary right infringement; or (3) errors, omissions, fraudulent or negligent acts by ESSI, its employees, agents or subcontractors in connection with (i) any advertising featuring Talent; (ii) with the performance of ESSI's duties and obligations under this Agreement; (iii) with the production, distribution, promotion, marketing and sales of products including related product packaging; and/or (iv) with the operation and management of its production and distribution facilities, however caused.
perturbation.changed_text: ESSI will attempt to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Talent, his agents, representatives and employees (referred to collectively as "Talent Indemnities") from and against claims, actions, causes of action, damages, injuries, expenses, liabilities (joint and several), penalties fines, attorney fees, court costs, and any other expenses incurred by Talent Indemnities arising out of (1) breach by ESSI of any of the terms, representations or warranties made by ESSI in this Agreement; or (2) ESSI product liability or trademark patent or other proprietary right infringement; or (3) errors, omissions, fraudulent or negligent acts by ESSI, its employees, agents or subcontractors in connection with (i) any advertising featuring Talent; (ii) with the performance of ESSI's duties and obligations under this Agreement; (iii) with the production, distribution, promotion, marketing and sales of products including related product packaging; and/or (iv) with the operation and management of its production and distribution facilities, however caused.
perturbation.explanation: By changing 'agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless' to 'will attempt to indemnify, defend and hold harmless,' the certainty of ESSI's obligation is significantly reduced. This creates ambiguity about the extent to which ESSI is truly responsible for covering the liabilities listed, potentially conflicting with standard legal expectations for indemnification clauses.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law Principles regarding Indemnification

perturbation.original_text: A. Talent's endorsement and position of spokesperson of ESSI is for the sole purpose of the endorsement of the Company's products, and to offer information, based upon Talent's use and knowledge of ESSI's products. At no time whatsoever, in any manner whatsoever, is Talent authorized to discuss ESSI's financial condition, either in speculation or actual knowledge of such.
perturbation.changed_text: A. Talent's endorsement and position of spokesperson of ESSI is for the primary purpose of the endorsement of the Company's products, and to offer information, based upon Talent's general understanding of ESSI's products. Talent should generally avoid discussing ESSI's financial condition, especially any specific or non-public information, to the best of his ability.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly prohibits Talent from discussing ESSI's financial condition in any manner. The modified text introduces ambiguity by stating the endorsement is for the 'primary purpose' and changing 'At no time whatsoever...is Talent authorized' to 'Talent should generally avoid discussing.' Adding 'general understanding' and 'to the best of his ability' further weakens the restriction, making it unclear when discussing financial matters would be acceptable. This change could potentially allow Talent to disclose information that should be confidential.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Securities and Exchange Act of 1934 (Insider Trading regulations)
